attributes.action: Stop the proposed "Eco Town" at RAF Newton, Bingham, Nottinghamshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This so-called "eco town" will double the size of the existing town of Bingham, changing it's character out of all recognition, and put added pressure of the local road network which is already at capacity.  Local residents do not want it !
